title: 出现如下报错后玩家就断开连接
author: zwj159
txt_content:
[12:32:53] [Server thread/WARN]: [Essentials] Task #23029 for Essentials v2.15.0.16 generated an exception
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Not connected to server.
        at org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection.sendPacket(XMPPConnection.java:445) ~[?:?]
        at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.XMPPManager.updatePresence(XMPPManager.java:144) ~[?:?]
        at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.EssentialsXMPP.updatePresence(EssentialsXMPP.java:109) ~[?:?]
        at com.earth2me.essentials.xmpp.EssentialsXMPPPlayerListener$2.run(EssentialsXMPPPlayerListener.java:51) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71) ~[spigot-1.11.jar:git-Spigot-f950f8e-b6ad714]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:353) [spigot-1.11.jar:git-Spigot-f950f8e-b6ad714]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:730) [spigot-1.11.jar:git-Spigot-f950f8e-b6ad714]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:399) [spigot-1.11.jar:git-Spigot-f950f8e-b6ad714]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:675) [spigot-1.11.jar:git-Spigot-f950f8e-b6ad714]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:574) [spigot-1.11.jar:git-Spigot-f950f8e-b6ad714]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_45]

replies.txt_content: ess插件出问题了，建议更换一个

replies.author: penjing
replies.txt_content: 基础插件数据报错 把里面基础插件存档删了

replies.author: Not103
replies.txt_content:
Essentials插件发出的报错，你的开头就有他的前缀
解决方法如下
1.删除ESS基础插件，更换为ESSX，加强版本
2.删除Essentials配置文件夹内的data，清除玩家数据[金币等数据]
3.第二条意思是说清除插件和权限组配置等数据，存档是不会变的
4.他这段报错意思是数据库链接不上差不多就这个意思

如我的回答令你满意请给个最佳回答
